# HV_ION_NONE

**Global Variable**

The value that represents a request for no notifications.

## Declaration

```swift
var HV_ION_NONE: Int { get }
```

## Discussion

Use this value to clear the I/O notifier’s notification request mask when you no longer want to receive notifications for any notifier event type. This only stops the delivery of notifications, it doesn’t remove notifiers. To remove a specific notifier use [doc://com.apple.hypervisor/documentation/Hypervisor/hv_vm_remove_pio_notifier(_:_:_:_:_:)].

## Notifier options

- **HV_ION_ANY_SIZE**: The value that represents a request for notifications of an I/O result of any size.
- **HV_ION_ANY_VALUE**: The value that represents a request for notifications of an I/O result that contains any value.
- **HV_ION_EXIT_FULL**: The value that represents a request for notifications if the I/O queue is full.
